FOLLOW_FLOW.description: Move with pedestrians ahead, maintaining normal following distance and speed.

YIELD_TO_HUMAN.description: Pause or slow to allow a pedestrian (or group) to pass first.

BYPASS_GROUP_LEFT.description: Detour left to go around a stationary or slow group.

BYPASS_GROUP_RIGHT.description: Detour right to go around a stationary or slow group.

KEEP_RIGHT_AGAINST_TRAFFIC.description: Proceed while keeping right when pedestrians come toward you.

MERGE_WITH_TRAFFIC.description: Merge into a pedestrian stream moving in the same direction.

WAIT_FOR_CLEAR.description: Stop until path ahead is free beyond a clearance threshold.

CROSS_AT_CROSSWALK.description: Cross when safe and aligned with crosswalk heading.

WEAVE_THROUGH_CROWD.description: Advance through crowd with small lateral motions while keeping minimum clearance.

PROCEED_SIDEWALK.description: Nominal sidewalk travel with no special interaction.
